abstract: United States women's soccer team are leaning on veteran defender Ali Krieger as team prepares for World Cup semifinal match against Germany, top-ranked team in world; Krieger played in Germany for three years and is familiar with many of team's players.
lead_paragraph: Amid all the preparations for the Americans’ match against the top-ranked Germans, the scouting reports from the defender Ali Kreiger may carry extra weight because she played in Germany from 2008 to 2011.

headline.main: At Women’s World Cup, U.S. Scouts Germany With Help From an Inside Source
headline.print_headline: Americans Turn to Inside Source to Scout a Foe

snippet: Amid all the preparations for the Americans’ match against the top-ranked Germans, the scouting reports from the defender Ali Kreiger may carry extra weight because she played in Germany from 2008 to 2011.

keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
